Installations¶

Install python and make sure it’s running on your computer operating system environment or web server.

Python Python can be downloaded at https://www.python.org/downloads If you are using a cloud open terminal type or paste sudo apt-get install python3 download environment and Pytonik requirement.

During installation process add to path but if missed out, then you will have to add it to environment

path once the installation is completed.

After installation process, open Terminal/Command Promote and type in python or which python.

Note:- which python command might not work on windows environment, to achieve this, it will need the help of https://git-scm.com on windows 10 or newer, install ubuntu https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/ubuntu/9nblggh4msv6

Pytonik
